query.statement: SELECT NVL((입금총액 - 사용총액), 0) CURR_BALANCE FROM ( SELECT (SELECT NVL(SUM(AMT), 0) FROM MAS_ADVANCE WHERE (UPJANG = #UPJANG#) AND (ADV_KIND = 'I')) 입금총액, (SELECT NVL(SUM(ADJ_AMT), 0) + NVL(SUM(VAT), 0) - NVL(SUM(NOPAY_AMT), 0) FROM MAS_ADVANCE WHERE (UPJANG = #UPJANG#) AND (ADV_KIND = 'O')) 사용총액 FROM DUAL )
